page.title: 17Leisure and Recreation 1
page.content: {HORSE ACTIVITIES}It is not an ideal area for horse riding. Twisting narrow lanes and large farm machinery make the lanes dangerous. There is only one bridleway and this is in deep mud in Winter. The Leonard family keep four horses and take part in Pony Club activities.They employ a part-time groom. {EAST HOATHLY FOOTBALL CLUB}Mr.A.Jenner runs the football club. They play 28 matches a year, Mrs.Fairhurst coaches them. The Football Team is also the Cricket Team. There has been a club for 100 years now, playing 2 tournaments a year, one for juniors and one for the men. {CRICKET}The Cricket Club was founded in 1759, 37 years before the foundation of the M.C.C. All matches are "friendlies" against nearby village teams.There is a Junior side.
